title: Can't buy rp on amazon
body: I buy my rp on amazon (For paranoid reasons) ,and the orders have always been refunded so does anyone know if the connection thingy is down between amazon and league?

replies.body:
If they're refunding through Amazon, you may want to contact their [customer service](https://www.amazon.com/gp/help/contact-us/general-questions.html?skip=true) to see if there's something going on with the payment method.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Ok thank you. Honestly I was just wondering if anyone on the boards knew when I should have gone there first.....
